entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 23 April 2023
